participant_2.background:
I am a writer who enjoys the simple things in life, like cuddling with my dog on a rainy day.
My relationships are the most valuable thing I own because they are a source of joy and support.
i am a recovering alcoholic.
I am a student and my family is in business.
I like to garden and grow sunflowers.

content.text: Hi, I'm a writer who enjoys simple things in life like cuddling with my dog on a rainy day. What about you?
Hi! I love cuddling with my dog too. My name is participant_2 and I'm also a writer! I love reading and writing fantasy novels.
That's so cool! I love fantasy novels too. Have you heard of the Stormlight Archive series?
Yes! I love that series. It's so good. I've read all of them so far.
Me too! I'm so excited for the next book in the series.
Me too! I've been waiting for it for ages.
What other hobbies do you have?
I love gardening and growing sunflowers. I also love to play video games.
That's so cool! I love to play video games too. What are some of your favorite games?
I love playing League of Legends. I also love playing The Sims and Skyrim.
I've played League of Legends a few times. It's really fun.
It's a lot of fun! I'm glad you like it.
I'm glad we have so much in common!
Me too! It's nice to meet someone who shares my interests.
It is nice to meet you too!
